title: Bug 104630: Column icons not displaying when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not being displayed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database using the following details: - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui - User Name: root - Password: root 4. Once the Data Source is set up, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6. [Need more details here. Please provide steps to encounter the issue with the column icons.]
